title: 10: Hygiene in the shed? Let the cows tell you! Scoring system

tasks.task: Scoring System for Shed Hygiene in Dairy Farms
subtasks: Score cows with more than a palm-sized amount of dirtiness (score 1)
Score cows with more than a forearm length of dirtiness (score 2)
Interpret scores (clean system vs. needing attention)
Identify potential问题 areas based on dirtiness location
